Popular school may have competitive admissions

ai_analysis.summary: Comenius Lyceum Amsterdam is one of Amsterdam's most sought-after secondary schools, celebrating 25 years of educational excellence in Nieuw-West. Offering MAVO, HAVO, and VWO education with a strong foundation and highly engaged staff, the school emphasizes comprehensive student development. Unique features include an official Youth Court (Jongerenrechtbank) appointed by Amsterdam's district court, a VWO+ accelerated program for advanced students, and an IT/Technology Lab focused on innovation. The school provides language support, guidance programs, and student voice through participation structures, creating a pleasant atmosphere for learning and growth.
